00029 #include "PdeAndBoundaryConditions.hpp"
00030 
00031 template<unsigned DIM>
00032 PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::PdeAndBoundaryConditions(AbstractLinearEllipticPde<DIM,DIM>* pPde,
00033                                                         AbstractBoundaryCondition<DIM>* pBoundaryCondition,
00034                                                         bool isNeumannBoundaryCondition)
00035     : mpPde(pPde),
00036       mpBoundaryCondition(pBoundaryCondition),
00037       mIsNeumannBoundaryCondition(isNeumannBoundaryCondition),
00038       mCurrentSolution(NULL)
00039 {
00040 }
00041 
00042 template<unsigned DIM>
00043 PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::~PdeAndBoundaryConditions()
00044 {
00045     if (mCurrentSolution)
00046     {
00047         VecDestroy(mCurrentSolution);
00048     }
00049 }
00050 
00051 template<unsigned DIM>
00052 AbstractLinearEllipticPde<DIM,DIM>* PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::GetPde()
00053 {
00054     return mpPde;
00055 }
00056 
00057 template<unsigned DIM>
00058 AbstractBoundaryCondition<DIM>* PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::GetBoundaryCondition() const
00059 {
00060     return mpBoundaryCondition;
00061 }
00062 
00063 template<unsigned DIM>
00064 Vec PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::GetSolution()
00065 {
00066     return mCurrentSolution;
00067 }
00068 
00069 template<unsigned DIM>
00070 void PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::SetSolution(Vec solution)
00071 {
00072     mCurrentSolution = solution;
00073 }
00074 
00075 template<unsigned DIM>
00076 bool PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::IsNeumannBoundaryCondition()
00077 {
00078     return mIsNeumannBoundaryCondition;
00079 }
00080 
00081 template<unsigned DIM>
00082 bool PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::HasAveragedSourcePde()
00083 {
00084     return (dynamic_cast<AveragedSourcePde<DIM>*>(mpPde) != NULL);
00085 }
00086 
00087 template<unsigned DIM>
00088 void PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::DestroySolution()
00089 {
00090     if (mCurrentSolution)
00091     {
00092         VecDestroy(mCurrentSolution);
00093     }
00094 }
00095 
00096 template<unsigned DIM>
00097 void PdeAndBoundaryConditions<DIM>::SetUpSourceTermsForAveragedSourcePde(TetrahedralMesh<DIM,DIM>* pMesh)
00098 {
00099     assert(HasAveragedSourcePde());
00100     static_cast<AveragedSourcePde<DIM>*>(mpPde)->SetupSourceTerms(*pMesh);
00101 }

00109 template class PdeAndBoundaryConditions<3>;
